column1: 261315,Cyber Security Engineer,,"Implement security measures for computer or information systems
column3: Analyse security of systems, network or data
column5: Test computer system operations to ensure proper functioning
column7: Monitor the security of digital information
column9: Identify security threats and determine counter measures
column11: Respond to cyber attacks and restore protection to systems if compromised
column13: Ensure business strategies comply with information security standards
column15: Design computer modelling or simulation programs
column17: Review computer information systems, procedures and networks
column21: Monitor the performance of computer networks
column27: Assess network-related risks and specify recovery routines and contingency procedures
column29: Collect, process and preserve digital records or evidence in accordance with procedures
column31: Train others in cyber security issues
column33: Troubleshoot issues with computer applications or systems
column35: Recommend changes to improve computer or information systems
column37: Develop computer or information security policies or procedures
column43: Analyse data to identify or resolve operational problems
column45: Train others in computer interface or software use
column47: Evaluate utility of software or hardware technologies
column49: Manage information technology projects or system activities
column53: Collaborate with others to resolve information technology issues
column59: Identify information technology project resource requirements
column61: Update knowledge about emerging industry or technology trends",0.05407805687658292
